data.text: @dangeondelver @TomasRicardos @GovNedLamont Risk is more nuanced & cannot be dichotomized simply into vaxxed vs. unvaxxed.  Additional data on characteristics of hospitalized individuals (age, preexisting medical conditions) is needed to provide a more accurate estimate of risk for any individual or group of individuals.

@TomasRicardos @GovNedLamont That's correct, it's not magic. I'm not sure why you would think otherwise. It was previously something like 95% effective against the original variant, and it's actually pretty surprising it's working at all against Omicron, so halving hospitalizations is really impressive.
